inmis.advancement.baby_backpack.title: Goody Bag
inmis.advancement.ender_pouch.title: Ender Access
inmis.advancement.ender_pouch.descriptio: Sticking your hand inside this bag makes it appear inside your Enderchest...
inmis.advancement.frayed_backpack.title: Backpack Beginnings
inmis.advancement.frayed_backpack.descri: It's not much, but it's mine! Craft a Frayed Backpack to expand your inventory space.
inmis.advancement.plated_backpack.title: Leveling Up
inmis.advancement.plated_backpack.descri: Surround your Frayed Backpack with Iron Ingots to expand its storage capabilities.
inmis.advancement.gilded_backpack.title: Gilded Expansions
inmis.advancement.gilded_backpack.descri: Enhance your Plated Backpack by plating it with gold. Shiny!
inmis.advancement.bejeweled_backpack.des: Stick some rare gems on your Gilded Backpack to make it even shinier!
inmis.advancement.blazing_backpack.title: Fiery Alternatives
inmis.advancement.blazing_backpack.descr: Plate your backpack with Netherite to make it immune to fire & lava.
inmis.advancement.withered_backpack.desc: Enhance your shiny backpack with a trophy obtained by the desolate king.
inmis.advancement.endless_backpack.title: The End
inmis.advancement.endless_backpack.descr: Obtain the ultimate backpack, fueled by the power of The End.
inmis.gui.set_filters.tooltip: Populate filters with stackable items already in the backpack
augment.backpacked.farmhand.desc: Harvesting a fully-grown crop replants a matching seed from the backpack.
augment.backpacked.funnelling.desc: Funnels picked up items into the backpack instead of the inventory.\nA filter can be applied to only allow specific items.\nIf the backpack is full or an item is not allowed, it will be placed into the inventory as normal.
augment.backpacked.funnelling.mode.allow: Only items that are activated in the list will be funnelled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.funnelling.mode.disal: All items except the items that are activated in the list will be funnelled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.desc: Allows hoppers to insert and extract items from the players worn backpack.\nThe player must stand either on top or in front the exit of the hopper.\nFilters can be applied to limit insertable and extractable items
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.extract: When enabled, allows hoppers to extract items from the backpack.
augment.backpacked.hopper_bridge.filter_: Only selected items can be inserted and extracted
Only selected items can be extracted, however any item can be inserted
Only selected items can be inserted, however any item can be extracted
All items may be both inserted and extracted
The filter mode determines when to check selected items
When enabled, allows hoppers to insert items into the backpack.
augment.backpacked.imbued_hide.desc: Strengthens the material of the backpack and makes it immune to fire damage
augment.backpacked.immortal.desc: Totems of Undying stored in the backpack will be activated on death.\nTotems held in the main and offhand will be used before ones located in the backpack.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.desc: Automatically places torches from the backpack at the players feet.\nA minimum light level can be configured to prevent over placing.\nAny type of torch will be placed, but can be toggled.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.light_lev: The light level that must be reached before placing a torch. The higher the number, the more frequent a torch will be placed.
augment.backpacked.lightweaver.place_sou: Determines whether a sound should play when placing a torch
augment.backpacked.lootbound.blocks.tool: When enabled, drops from blocks will be pulled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.lootbound.desc: A companion augment for Funnelling that enhances item harvesting.\nItems dropped by mining blocks and killing mobs will pulled into the backpack from a distance.\nFilters from Funnelling determine if an item will be pulled.
augment.backpacked.lootbound.mobs.toolti: When enabled, drops from mobs will be pulled into the backpack
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.desc: Allows projectile weapons to pull ammunition from the backpack.\nCan be configured to prioritise backpack or inventory.
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.b: The backpack will be searched first
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.i: The players inventory will be searched first
augment.backpacked.quiverlink.priority.t: Determines which inventory to search first when locating ammunition
augment.backpacked.reforge.desc: Repairs damaged items inside the backpack upon picking up experience orbs.\nOnly repairs items enchanted with Mending.\nItems are repaired collectively, rather than one at a time.
augment.backpacked.seedflow.desc: Sprinkles crop seeds from the backpack onto empty farmland around the player.\nA filter be configured to plant only specific seeds.\nMay also be set up to plant random seeds.
augment.backpacked.seedflow.randomize_se: When enabled, a random seed from the backpack will be planted instead of the first available. Handpicked Mode will affect the random selection.
When enabled, only allows the selected seeds to be planted.
